headline: Oppenheimer Raises AppLovin Corporation (APP) Price Target to $480, Highlights AI-Powered Ad Tech and E-Commerce Growth
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 15 Buzzing AI Stocks Making Headlines. In this article, we are going to take a look at where AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) stands against the other buzzing AI stocks. Power needs for artificial intelligence and cloud computing are expanding so rapidly that some data center campuses may use more electricity […]

headline: Up Over 700% This Year, Has AppLovin Stock Finally Reached a Peak?
summary: AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) is a software company that surged in value this year.  Investors appear to be buying up the growth story in droves, with shares of AppLovin going parabolic and hitting all-time highs this year.  Has the stock peaked, or could there still be more upside left for investors who buy shares of AppLovin today?
